original_title: Young woman dies after receiving two injections at Peradeniya Hospital
original_body_lines: A young woman admitted to the Peradeniya teaching hospital last morning with a complaint of abdominal pain, died after being given two injections.
The victim, Sandeepani Madushika Jayaratne (21) was a resident of Potthapitiya in Kadugannawa.

Her mother Maya Indrani and father Y. G. Jayaratne said their daughter who developed abdominal pain was admitted to Ketapitiya divisional hospital and transferred to Peradeniya teaching hospital where she died after having been given two injections by a nurse.
They said soon after the injection, she started crying and complaining of severe pain and vomited before she died.
A senior official said the hospital administration initiated an investigation into the incident but he refused to make any further comments on this death. (J.A.L.Jayasisnghe and Shane Seneviratne)
